properties.areaDesc: Greater Portland Metro Area; Greater Vancouver Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:46PM PST until January 13 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. New snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches
above 500 feet.

* WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon,
Greater Portland Metro Area.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Below 500 feet expect a mix of rain and
snow showers with little if any accumulation.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST MONDAY
